context.title: Horizon Stretch
context.description: Horizon Stretch converts time-based horizons to depth and depth-based horizons to time.

context.title: Velocity Flood
context.description: Velocity Flood modifies velocities above, below, or between horizons, using constant or variable flood velocities.

topic.label: Flooding Salt Velocity in GeoCraft: Starting the Procedure
Flooding Salt Velocity with a Constant Flood Type
Flooding Salt Velocity with a Gradient Flood Type
Flooding Salt Velocity with a Dataset Flood Type

context.title: Volume Stretch
context.description: Volume Stretch converts depth-based volumes to time, or converts time-based volumes to depth.

context.title: Horizon Cascade (d->t->d)
context.description: Horizon Cascade (d->t->d) converts a depth horizon to time using one velocity, then back to depth using a second velocity.

context.title: Volume Cascade (d->t->d)
context.description: Volume Cascade (d->t->d) converts a depth volume to time using one velocity, then back to depth using a second velocity.

context.title: Multi-Flooding Preview
context.description: Preview results from constant velocity flooding between several horizon pairs. This allows a quick check of flooding parameters by processing only the current Inline or Xline in the 3D Viewer.

context.title: Velocity Flood Preview
context.description: Preview results from the standard velocity flooding algorithm. This allows a quick check of flooding parameters by processing only the current Inline or Xline in the 3D Viewer.

context.title: Velocity Smoothing
context.description: Velocity Smoothing removes rough transitions from a volume by laterally smoothing adjacent traces.
